CARDS.title: Cause List Checker
CARDS.description:
**Cause List Checker** is a FastAPI-based web application that automates searching through Punjab and Haryana High Court cause list PDFs for specific case details, fetches comprehensive case information from the court website, and sends automated email notifications with search results to legal professionals.

**Tech Stack:**

- Python
- FastAPI
- Docker
- Gmail SMTP

CARDS.title: Cafe Safar
CARDS.description:
**Cafe Safar** is a comprehensive full stack application designed for order management at the restaurant 'Cafe-Safar'. It features distinct user and admin views. Users can place orders, review past orders and transactions, and manage their profiles. Admins have the ability to oversee orders, update the menu, monitor payments, and handle various administrative functions.

**Tech Stack:**

- MongoDB
- Express.js
- React
- Node.js

CARDS.title: Slack DM Sender
CARDS.description:
**Slack DM Sender** is a Slack bot that allows you to send direct messages to users in your workspace, appearing as if sent by you. Ideal for automated communication.

**Tech Stack:**

- Node.js
- Slack API
- Express.js
- Bull Queue

CARDS.title: Run AWS Locally (Docker-Localstack)
CARDS.description:
**Run AWS Locally (Docker-Localstack)** is a project that simplifies your local development by emulating AWS cloud services using Localstack within Docker. This setup enables seamless testing and development of AWS-dependent applications locally, supporting S3 and SQS as of now, and ensuring faster feedback loops without incurring cloud costs.

**Tech Stack:**

- Docker
- LocalStack
- AWS S3
- AWS SQS

CARDS.title: Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming
CARDS.description:
**Gesture-Controlled Interactive Gaming** is an innovative computer vision project enabling hand gestures to control a game. Map gestures to W, A, S, D keys for a dynamic, hands-free gaming experience.

**Tech Stack:**

- Python
- OpenCV
- MediaPipe
- Computer Vision
